attributes.action: Look into passing a law to stop security officers working alone during the night time with or without check calls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that working alone at night is not only dangerous, but also life threatening. There have been more than one occasion where a security officer has been violently attacked during there night shift whilst working alone. This matter must be resolved as it will cause an abereavement in a family if it has not already.
